name: The Age Clock
description:
Game made with Godot 3 for the Weekly Game Jam 42.

The theme is Time Travel. I started late and had 2 days to do it.

This is my first game and a prototype :). It contains only one small level where you learn how to control the character and use the age clock power.

With this power you can go back in time (it only affects you) and take your baby form, or forward in time to take your elderly form. There are 3 forms: adult, baby, elder.

Each form has specific traits that make them necessary to go through the level.

The animations of the character (and the power animation on top of it) are hand made by me using GraphicsGale software. It was fun animating these simple characters :).

The other assets are mostly from Kenney.

Update: the game now doesn't run the debug window when the game is launched, enjoy! :)
